feed.title: Actual AI Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Actual AI: 1.8.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add support for Groq and other improvements by @kevingatera in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/162

New Contributors

  • @kevingatera made their first contribution in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/162

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/compare/1.7.8...1.8.0

entry.title: New release for Actual AI: 2.0.1 - Fix creating category group
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add unit tests for CategorySuggestionOptimizer and SimilarityCalculator. by @kevingatera in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/198
  • Fix: Issue 199 error when creating new categories by @kevingatera in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/200
  • Bump @ai-sdk/google from 1.2.1 to 1.2.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/201
  • Bump @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin from 8.27.0 to 8.28.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/202
  • Bump ai from 4.2.0 to 4.2.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/203
  • Bump ts-jest from 29.2.6 to 29.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/205
  • Bump @types/node from 22.13.11 to 22.13.14 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/208
  • Bump @ai-sdk/groq from 1.2.0 to 1.2.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/206
  • Bump @ai-sdk/anthropic from 1.2.0 to 1.2.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/204
  • Bump @typescript-eslint/parser from 8.27.0 to 8.28.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/207
  • Bump @ai-sdk/openai from 1.3.0 to 1.3.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/209

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/compare/2.0.0...2.0.1

entry.title: New release for Actual AI: 2.0.2 Update @actual-app/api to 25.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update @actual-app/api to 25.4.0
  • docs: update README.md by @eltociear in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/210

New Contributors

  • @eltociear made their first contribution in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/210

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/compare/2.0.1...2.0.2

entry.title: New release for Actual AI: 2.0.3 - Fix no classification when no `imported_payee`
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix classification no imported payee by @sakowicz in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/222
  • Refactor transaction service part 1 - split into multiple files by @sakowicz in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/213
  • Refactor transaction service pt2 - Tags by @sakowicz in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/214
  • Bump ai from 4.3.0 to 4.3.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/216
  • Bump @ai-sdk/groq from 1.2.4 to 1.2.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/217
  • Bump @ai-sdk/google from 1.2.6 to 1.2.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/215
  • Refactor transaction service pt3 by @sakowicz in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/218

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/compare/2.0.2...2.0.3

entry.title: New release for Actual AI: 2.0.4 Shutdown api only when budget was successfully opened
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Shutdown api only when budget was successfully opened https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/commit/29ab3f2115b876e7c430d292ad8220e8b247ce20
  • Bump @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin from 8.29.0 to 8.29.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/219
  • Bump @typescript-eslint/parser from 8.29.0 to 8.29.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/220

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/compare/2.0.3...2.0.4
